Title: Dodge Training
Description: Basic Battle Info

Title: Advanced Battle
Description: Advanced Battle Info

Title: Construct Battle
Description: Construct Battle

Title: Lotus - Dual Blades
Description: Pinging a Red Orb within 4 seconds after any 3-Ping will make Lucia Burst. Lucia then replaces Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: Laser Cluster
Description: After any 3-Ping, the next Red Orb skill carries out laser beams.

Title: EX - Slash Storm
Description: When pinging a Yellow Orb after a 3-Ping, Nanami will use EX - Slash Storm and launch 8 consecutive attacks at nearby targets, dealing a certain amount of Physical DMG per attack.

Title: Controlling Bullet
Description: After pinging a Yellow Orb, the next Red Orb bullet will inflict Blast. Blast: Bullet explodes after hitting the target, dealing * Fire DMG to enemies in the area

Title: Burst Mode
Description: Core Passive: Karenina will Burst after 3 times of 3-Ping. The next Basic Attack will turn into a ranged artillery attack for 3 seconds and deals * Physical DMG per shot.

Title: Quiver Of Mercy
Description: Core Passive: 1 energy arrow will be stored in the quiver after a 3-Ping. The quiver can store up to 3 arrows. All arrows will be released when performing the next Signature Move and each arrow deals a certain amount of Physical DMG.

Title: Fleeting Phantom
Description: Enemies will be marked when hit by the last hit of a 3-Ping skill. If a marked enemy is hit by the last hit of a 3-Ping skill, 5 energy clones will be generated for 5 seconds. Clones will attack once with each Basic Attack. Each clone attack deals a certain amount of Physical DMG.

Title: Offence-Defense Rhythm
Description: Counterattacks and unleashes sword waves after a successful block, dealing Physical DMG to the enemy.

Title: Lotus - Dance of Lightning
Description: Lightning Lure: When launching a lightning attack at an enemy marked by Lucia, it has a chance to summon lightning bolts that deal Lightning DMG to the target.

Title: Reversed Egretfield
Description: Hitting a marked enemy with Basic Attacks has a chance to trigger Lightning Lure that deals Lightning DMG. Red Orb has 30%, 60% and 100% of chance to trigger Lightning Lure. When triggered for the 5th time, the next Lightning Lure will carry out Ex - Lightning Lure, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies and healing allies in the area.

Title: Fighting Will
Description: Perform a 3-Ping for 10 Energy. Gains increased Physical and Dark Resistance when in Dark Form.

Title: Goddess Connection System
Description: Hitting a marked enemy has a 20% chance to trigger Light Penalty that deals Physical DMG. After a 3-Ping or triggering 5 times of Light Penalty, heals nearby allies for a certain amount of HP.

Title: Space Lord
Description: Core Passive: After a 3-Ping, pinging the next Red Orb will carry out consecutive shots that deals * Physical DMG per shot.

Title: Thermal Armament
Description: Karenina gains thermal energy by 3-Pings and Signature Moves. She becomes enhanced and gains a certain amount of Fire DMG Bonus after her thermal energy reaches 50%. When enhanced, she loses 5% of thermal energy per second. Each level of Core Passive increases her starting thermal energy by 3%.

Title: Overclocking Resonance
Description: Nanami accumulates energy by Basic Attacks and pinging orbs. Performs a Signature Move up to 3 times after the energy is accumulated to a certain level. After a Signature Move, Nanami enters Overclocking state. Basic Attacks of Nanami will then deal Fire DMG and reduce a certain amount of Fire Resistance of the target being hit.

Title: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will
Description: Lucia accumulates Blade Will by a Blue Orb 3-Ping. 3-Ping again to trigger a backward dodge and Lucia will enter Blade Will state that grants Super Armor. In this state, all Signal Orbs will be converted into Blade Will and two additional Signal Orbs will be gained. Clicking the Blade Will Orbs will unleash sword waves.

Title: Vector Cube
Description: Pinging a Blue Orb after any 3-Ping will cause Ayla to charge up, draw in nearby enemies, and gain a shield equal to 8% of her maximum HP for 7s. Ayla then unleashes a heavy strike to the targets ahead, dealing a large amount of Physical DMG. DMG taken reduces by 70% when charging.

Title: Cosmic Wave
Description: When pinging a Red Orb after any 3-Ping, transforms into shadow and launches consecutive attacks to deal Dark DMG at the area ahead. When finished, enters enhanced shadow form that allows Basic Attacks to deal additional Dark DMG and Chasing Blade to deal additional Dark DMG. Lasts 5s.

Title: Critical Moment
Description: Enters into sniping mode when pinging a Blue Orb after a Red Orb 3-Ping. During so, Basic Attack shoots a long-ranged lightning arrow to deal Lightning DMG. Exits sniping mode if 6 lightning arrows are shot or if 6 seconds pass. Dodging in sniping mode will lower the charge time of the next Basic Attack.

Title: Field Supplies
Description: On the last combo of Basic Attack, 3-Ping, Signature Move, or QTE, targets will drop an Energy Ball. Picking up an Energy Ball heals friendly members in the area and boosts their Fire DMG. Picking up an Energy Ball earns Sophia Energy and Heat and increases her ATK.

Title: Arclight Shield
Description: Any 3-Ping + Blue Orb will generate a shield that blocks damage. The shield explodes and deals wide area damage when it expires or when it becomes refreshed.

Title: Halcyonic Blossoms
Description: Every 3-ping made in the Normal Form generates 50% more Energy and 1 Signature Point. Up to 2 Signature Points can be accumulated. Using Form Switch in the Normal Form will transform Plume into the Arctic Form. Switching with full Energy will re-arrange all the existing Signal Orbs. Ice DMG is increased when in the Arctic Form. A 3-ping grants 1 Signature Point. Final - Halcyonic Blossoms requires 4 Signature Points to cast.

Title: Surging Madness
Description: Any 3-ping in the normal mode will accumulate Madness (up to 3 stacks). Once Camu reaches full Madness, he will gain bonus energy from any 3-ping. When he enters the Berserk mode, he will consume all Madness stacks and gain damage bonus based on the number of Madness stacks consumed.

Title: Mass Illusion
Description: Overclock Pts are earned automatically over time or through pinging Signal Orbs. Once Vera has enough Overclock Pts, long tap the Basic Attack to launch her Core Attack. Vera's Core Attack deals Dark DMG in an area, and Physical DMG to targets in melee range. Vera will consume Overclock Pts and gain energy when casting her Core Attack.

Title: Wide-area electromagnetic cannon
Description: Rosetta can have up to 3 energy points. When performing a 3-Ping, consumes 1 energy point to gain DMG Bonus. When performing a Signature, consumes up to 2 energy points to gain DMG Bonus based on the energy points consumed. If there are no energy points left, Rosetta enters Full Burst form. Tap and hold basic attack to build up her power. When at max power, she will fire [wide-area electromagnetic cannon]. 3 energy points will be restored in 8s after this shot.

Title: Follow-Up
Description: Changyu has a special "Follow-Up" Orb that normally cannot be pinged or tagged. It will light up for a while upon a 3-Ping. Tap it to perform different follow-up skills based on the color of orbs pinged.

Title: Concentrated Will
Description: Pinging orbs or performing a Signature Move will accumulate Sync Rate. When the Sync Rate is at maximum, Signal Orbs are enhanced, and Qu enters the Concentrated Will state once an orb is pinged. Enhanced Signal Orbs can only be pinged individually. When pinged (no Energy granted), costs Sync Rate and triggers a 3-Ping skill and Concentrated Will. The Sync Rate goes down over time in the Concentrated Will state.

Title: Laser Cluster
Description: After any 3-Ping, the next Red Orb skill carries out laser beams.

Title: EX - Slash Storm
Description: When pinging a Yellow Orb after a 3-Ping, Nanami will use EX - Slash Storm and launch 8 consecutive attacks at nearby targets, dealing a certain amount of Physical DMG per attack.

Title: In Matrix, 1 orb=3-Ping / Red Orbs=passive effect.
Description: Pinging a Red Orb within 4 seconds after any 3-Ping will make Lucia Burst. Lucia then replaces Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: Blue Orb QTE Description
Description: Pinging a 3-Ping Blue Orb can activate the teammate in blue place. Clicks to trigger the QTE skill of that character.

Title: Yellow Orb QTE Description
Description: Pinging a 3-Ping Yellow Orb can activate the teammate in blue place. Clicks to trigger the QTE skill of that character.

Title: Ping Tips
Description: When having 4 Skill Orbs with the same color, click the outmost Skill Orb to save a 3-Ping skill by only pinging one Orb. This trick can be used to use two consecutive 3-Ping skills within Matrix.

Title: In Matrix, 1 orb=3-Ping / Red Orbs=passive effect.
Description: Pinging a Red Orb within 4 seconds after any 3-Ping will make Lucia Burst. Lucia then replaces Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: In Matrix, 1 orb=3-Ping / Red Orbs=passive effect.
Description: After any 3-Ping, the next Red Orb skill carries out laser beams.

Title: In Matrix, 1 orb=3-Ping / Yellow Orbs=passive effect.
Description: When pinging a Yellow Orb after a 3-Ping, Nanami will use EX - Slash Storm and launch 8 consecutive attacks at nearby targets, dealing a certain amount of Physical DMG per attack.

Title: In Matrix, 1 orb=3-Ping / Red Orbs=passive effect.
Description: Pinging a Red Orb within 4 seconds after any 3-Ping will make Lucia Burst. Lucia then replaces Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: Annihilation
Description: The next Orb pinged is regarded 3-Ping after a 3-Ping. Accumulate Annihilation Points and press and hold the basic attack button to enter the Annihilation State, change the basic attack form, and obtain Annihilation Orbs. Ping Annihilation Orbs to gain Energy and cast targeted spikes. Basic Attack consumes Annihilation Points in the Annihilation State, while Signature Move depletes all Annihilation Points. After depleting all Annihilation Points or being swapped out, exit the Annihilation State.

Title: Critical Moment
Description: Enters into sniping mode when pinging a Blue Orb after a Red Orb 3-Ping. During so, Basic Attack shoots a long-ranged lightning arrow to deal Lightning DMG. Exits sniping mode if 6 lightning arrows are shot or if 6 seconds pass. Dodging in sniping mode will lower the charge time of the next Basic Attack.

Title: Reversed Egretfield
Description: Hitting a marked enemy with Basic Attacks has a chance to trigger Lightning Lure that deals Lightning DMG. Red Orb has 30%, 60% and 100% of chance to trigger Lightning Lure. When triggered for the 5th time, the next Lightning Lure will carry out Ex - Lightning Lure, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies and healing allies in the area.

Title: Annihilation
Description: The next Orb pinged is regarded 3-Ping after a 3-Ping. Accumulate Annihilation Points and press and hold the basic attack button to enter the Annihilation State, change the basic attack form, and obtain Annihilation Orbs. Ping Annihilation Orbs to gain Energy and cast targeted spikes. Basic Attack consumes Annihilation Points in the Annihilation State, while Signature Move depletes all Annihilation Points. After depleting all Annihilation Points or being swapped out, exit the Annihilation State.

Title: Annihilation
Description: The next Orb pinged is regarded 3-Ping after a 3-Ping. Accumulate Annihilation Points and press and hold the basic attack button to enter the Annihilation State, change the basic attack form, and obtain Annihilation Orbs. Ping Annihilation Orbs to gain Energy and cast targeted spikes. Basic Attack consumes Annihilation Points in the Annihilation State, while Signature Move depletes all Annihilation Points. After depleting all Annihilation Points or being swapped out, exit the Annihilation State.

Title: Wide-area electromagnetic cannon
Description: Rosetta can have up to 3 energy points. When performing a 3-Ping, consumes 1 energy point to gain DMG Bonus. When performing a Signature, consumes up to 2 energy points to gain DMG Bonus based on the energy points consumed. If there are no energy points left, Rosetta enters Full Burst form. Power ATK becomes [wide-area electromagnetic cannon]. 3 energy points will be restored in 8s after this shot.

Title: Concentrated Will
Description: Pinging orbs or performing a Signature Move will accumulate Sync Rate. When the Sync Rate is at maximum, Signal Orbs are enhanced, and Qu enters the Concentrated Will state once an orb is pinged. Enhanced Signal Orbs can only be pinged individually. When pinged (no Energy granted), costs Sync Rate and triggers a 3-Ping skill and Concentrated Will. The Sync Rate goes down over time in the Concentrated Will state.

Title: Crimson Abyss - Luster Blade
Description: After a Blue Orb 3-Ping, any other 3-Ping will trigger Luster Blade. All Signal orbs will turn into Special Orbs and you will gain 2 Special Orbs. When the Special Orbs are eliminated, unleash a swordwave at the target and deal Physical Damage.

Title: Prototype
Description: After any 3-ping, calls upon the POD to launch homing missiles at the enemy in front and obtain POD: Shield. Once POD: Shield is fully charged, A2 is able to cast her Signature Move to activate Berserk Mode.

Title: Blade Rend
Description: After a Yellow 3-Ping, make another 3-Ping of any color to enter Battle Stance, which causes Basic Attacks, Red Orb, and Yellow Orb skills to launch Swordwaves. Pinging Red Orbs in Battle Stance can also stack Data Correction effect to increase Physical DMG.

Title: Overclock Strike
Description: After any 3-ping, an Overclock Indicator in corresponding color will be added to the far right of the Orbs bar. Tap the Overclock Indicator to ping all Signal Orbs of the corresponding color and cast the Core Skill.

Title: Tertian
Description: Making a 3-Ping will generate a [Triad] of the same color. The next Orb pinged will generate [Tune] and trigger Chord. Chord with the same color as the [Triad] will trigger [Concerto], dealing Lightning DMG. Chord with a color different to [Triad] will trigger [Solo], increasing own damage.

Title: Cold Snap
Description: After any 3-Ping, press Basic Attack within 1s to enter [Tactical Stance], and keep holding the Basic Attack button to maintain this form. Release the Basic Attack button to trigger [Blooming Shot]. The backstep of [Blooming Shot] is able to evade enemy attacks. If this move successfully dodges an attack, the follow-up shot will be enhanced.

Title: Frost Origin
Description: Glory gains [Condensed Frost] when he makes a 3-Ping while shield capacity is higher than 50%, or when he makes 3-Ping or Basic Attacks while [Frost Spirit] is active. [Condensed Frost] allows Chrome to ignore 1 attack, and slows the attacker instead.

Title: Frost Origin
Description: Glory gains [Condensed Frost] when he makes a 3-Ping while shield capacity is higher than 50%, or when he makes 3-Ping or Basic Attacks while [Frost Spirit] is active. [Condensed Frost] allows Chrome to ignore 1 attack, and slows the attacker instead.

Title: Shadow Prism Agglomerate
Description: After unleashing four basic attacks, the next Basic Attack will be an Enhanced Attack and form 1 Twilight Matrix. When No. 21 is in mid-air after a 3-Ping, using Dodge will trigger Instant Dodge and form 3 Twilight Matrices. The Co-Bot will unleash Force Wave when No. 21 unleashes an Enhanced Attack, controlling the enemy and detonating all Twilight Matrices. (Twilight Matrices last for 3s)

Title: Tertian
Description: Making a 3-Ping will generate a [Triad] of the same color. The next Orb pinged will generate [Tune] and trigger Chord. Chord with the same color as the [Triad] will trigger [Concerto], dealing Lightning DMG. Chord with a color different to [Triad] will trigger [Solo], increasing own damage.

Title: Overclock
Description: Nanami accumulates energy by Basic Attacks and pinging orbs. Performs a Signature Move up to 3 times after the energy is accumulated to a certain level. After a Signature Move, Nanami enters Overclocking state. Basic Attacks of Nanami will then deal Fire DMG and reduce a certain amount of Fire Resistance of the target being hit.

Title: Lightning Fall
Description: The next Basic Attack after a 3-Ping grants [Electric Charge]. It can stack up to 3 times. Press and hold the Basic Attack button to perform [Lightning Fall] that deals wide-area Lightning DMG based on the [Electric Charge] consumed and inflicts [Turbulence Interference].
